data.text: @rossoscud Joe Pesci is great. Great movie.
@Truthorfiction3 You have no counter argument except insults. Game Over https://t.co/eXD2UVmTNK

@Truthorfiction3 @US_FDA And this list keeps growing as the company continues to fail clinical trials or have uncompetitive results (HIV, NASH).   You keep making false claims about "saving lives."   Hey @SEC_Enforcement, here's another stock promoter making false claims.

@Truthorfiction3 @US_FDA “The company [CytoDyn] also received **subpoenas** from the Department of Justice and the Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) seeking information about its (exaggerated, possibly false) public statements about leronlimab.” Your guys are really screwing the pooch on this.
@rossoscud A+ on the spelling. Middle school is next. Congrats to your mom.

@Truthorfiction3 The science the FDA slapped down x2? The science that has yet to get 1 indication approved? The science that they refuse to release to the public besides mined data? The science the CEO bragged about that is now fired? The science the COB bragged about that is now demoted?
@rossoscud Just the truth. You deny the science of CCR5. You're doing much better on your spelling. You're mom must be around more often these days. Happy for you.

@Truthorfiction3 @US_FDA This makes me happy. You are so threatened by truth tellers you created a list. Like a 5 year old for Christmas. The amount of energy you put into this is comical. See your new website?
